member.name: ID2D1SvgPathData.CreatePathGeometry
member.summary: Creates a path geometry object representing the path data.
member.param: Fill mode for the path geometry object.
On completion, pathGeometry will contain a point to the created object.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPathData.GetCommands
member.summary: Gets commands from the commands array.
member.param: The element count of the buffer.
The index of the first commands to retrieve.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPathData.GetCommandsCount
member.summary: Gets the size of the commands array.
member.returns: Returns the size of the commands array.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPathData.GetSegmentData
member.summary: Gets data from the segment data array.
member.param: Buffer to contain the segment data array.
The element count of the buffer.
The index of the first segment data to retrieve.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPathData.GetSegmentDataCount
member.summary: Gets the size of the segment data array.
member.returns: Returns the size of the segment data array.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPathData.RemoveCommandsAtEnd
member.summary: Removes commands from the end of the commands array.
member.param: Specifies how many commands to remove.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPathData.RemoveSegmentDataAtEnd
member.summary: Removes data from the end of the segment data array.
member.param: Specifies how much data to remove.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPathData.UpdateCommands
member.summary: Updates the commands array. Existing commands not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new commands.
member.param: The number of commands to update.
The index at which to begin updating commands. Must be less than or equal to the size of the commands array.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPathData.UpdateSegmentData
member.summary: Updates the segment data array. Existing segment data not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new segment data.
member.param: The number of data to update.
The index at which to begin updating segment data. Must be less than or equal to the size of the segment data array.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Interface describing SVG path data. Path data can be set as the 'd' attribute on a 'path' element.

The path data set is factored into two arrays. The segment data array stores all numbers and the commands array stores the set of commands. Unlike the string data set in the d attribute, each command in this representation uses a fixed number of elements in the segment data array. Therefore, the path 'M 0,0 100,0 0,100 Z' is represented as: 'M0,0 L100,0 L0,100 Z'. This is split into two arrays, with the segment data containing '0,0 100,0 0,100', and the commands containing 'M L L Z'.
